FuncDef: The display mpls-tp oam current-alarm command displays alarms associated with a MEG.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a MEG.
The value is a string of 1 to 14 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls-tp oam current-alarm meg abc
Alarm Name Start Time                    Meg Name      Sent
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view alarms associated with a specified MEG or all MEGs, run the display mpls-tp oam current-alarm command.
Prerequisites
The ME of the MEG has been bound to a tunnel.
